BULLETIN - EAS ACTIVATION REQUESTED
FLOOD WARNING
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE LAKE CHARLES LA
823 AM CDT TUE JUN 10 2014

...THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN LAKE CHARLES HAS ISSUED A FLOOD
WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING RIVERS IN LOUISIANA...

  VERMILION RIVER AT LAFAYETTE, SURREY STREET GAGE

LAC055-113-110323-
/O.NEW.KLCH.FL.W.0015.140610T1448Z-140612T1800Z/
/VLSL1.1.ER.140610T1448Z.140610T1800Z.140612T0600Z.NO/
823 AM CDT TUE JUN 10 2014

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN LAKE CHARLES HAS ISSUED A

* FLOOD WARNING FOR
  THE VERMILION RIVER AT LAFAYETTE, SURREY STREET GAGE.
* UNTIL THURSDAY AFTERNOON...OR UNTIL THE WARNING IS CANCELLED.
* AT  8:15 AM TUESDAY THE STAGE WAS 9.5 FEET.
* MINOR FLOODING IS FORECAST.
* FLOOD STAGE IS 10.0 FEET.
* FORECAST...RISE ABOVE FLOOD STAGE BY LATE THIS MORNING AND CONTINUE
  TO RISE TO NEAR 11.0 FEET BY THIS AFTERNOON. THE RIVER WILL FALL
  BELOW FLOOD STAGE BY EARLY THURSDAY MORNING.
* IMPACT...AT STAGES NEAR 10.0 FEET...MINOR FLOODING OF HEYMANN PARK
  OFF OF HIGHWAY 90 WILL OCCUR.

&&

LAT...LON 3026 9200 3000 9227 2991 9219 2992 9208
      3006 9203 3028 9193

$$
